arguments.value: ller must be owner or campaigner

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title CampaignLifecycle
 @dev This contract manages the campaign's lifecycle calls and state changes.

devdoc.details: This contract manages the campaign's lifecycle calls and state changes.

params.amount: The amount to be allocated to the campaign from the campaigner's balance.
params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address

params.newCampaigner: Address of the user having campaigner role to be used here

addFungibleCampaign(address,string,addre.details: Add a new campaign for fungible tokens

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign [string]
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address
params.tokenAmount: The amount of tokens to be allocated to the campaign
params.tokenId: The address of the token in solidity format

addNFTCampaign(address,string,address,in.details: Add a new campaign for NFT tokens

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign [string]
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address
params.tokenAmount: The amount of tokens to be allocated to the campaign
params.tokenId: The address of the token in solidity format

associateToken(address,uint32,bool).details: Adds or removes a token from the whitelist.

params.isWhitelisted: Boolean flag to mark the token as whitelisted or not.
params.tokenType: The type of the token (1 for FUNGIBLE, 2 for NFT).

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaignExpiryTime: The expiry time of the campaign in seconds

closeFungibleCampaign(string,uint256).details: Close a campaign with fungible tokens

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaignExpiryTime: The expiry time of the campaign in seconds

closeNFTCampaign(string,uint256).details: Close a campaign with NFT tokens

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaignExpiryTime: The expiry time of the campaign in seconds

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address

expiryFungibleCampaign(address,string,ad.details: Expiry a campaign with fungible and NFT tokens

params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address
params.tokenId: The address of the token in solidity format
params.tokenType: The type of the token (FUNGIBLE or NFT) [uint32] (1 for FUNGIBLE & 2 for NFT)

getAllWhitelistedTokens(uint32).details: Retrieves all whitelisted addresses for a given token type.

params.tokenType: The type of the token (1 for FUNGIBLE, 2 for NFT).

returns._0: An array of addresses that are whitelisted for the given token type.

getCampaignBalance(string).details: Balance holded by the user to see.

params.tokenId: Solidity address used for the account
params.tokenType: The type of the token (FUNGIBLE or NFT) [uint32] (1 for FUNGIBLE & 2 for NFT)

getNFTTokenBalance(address,address,uint3.details: Balance holded by the user to see.

params.tokenType: The type of the token (FUNGIBLE or NFT) [uint32] (1 for FUNGIBLE & 2 for NFT)                  1 for FUNGIBLE and 2 for NFT.

isTokenWhitelisted(uint32,address).details: Checks if a specific token address is whitelisted for a given token type.

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to check.
params.tokenType: The type of the token (1 for FUNGIBLE, 2 for NFT).

returns._0: Boolean flag indicating if the token is whitelisted.

rewardIntractors(address,string,uint256,.details: Distribute HBAR tokens to the campaigner

params.amounts: The amounts to be distributed to each receiver
params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address
params.receiversAddresses: The addresses of the receivers take max 50 addresses in one call
params.totalAmount: The total amount of tokens to be distributed

rewardIntractorsWithFungible(address,add.details: Distribute fungible tokens to the campaigner

params.amounts: The amounts to be distributed to each receiver
params.campaignAddress: The db address of the campaign
params.campaigner: The solidity address of the campaigner or wallet address
params.receiversAddresses: The addresses of the receivers take max 50 addresses in one call
params.tokenId: The address of the token in solidity format
params.tokenTotalAmount: The total amount of tokens to be distributed
params.tokenType: The type of the token (FUNGIBLE or NFT)

devdoc.title: CampaignLifecycle
